mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(POSITION, MEMBER_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, CTN, EMAIL, LAST_CONNECTED_DATETIME) VALUES (#{position}, #{memberName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ctn}, #{email}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, POSITION, MEMBER_NAME, NAME, CTN, EMAIL, LAST_CONNECTED_DATETIME FROM MEMBER
